attributes.action: make the welsh pay for welsh signs
attributes.additional_details: how many people speak welsh and dont speak english or at least understand it, why in this time of cut backs are we scared of upsetting such a minority , just because they want to prove a point , in north wales a road sign paid for by british tax payers read Flint and underneath it said Fflint , this is taking the translation to the extreme, it would be funny if we saw it on gavin and stacey. if they want signs in welsh let them pay for it. when are we going to stand up and say enough is enough.please sign this petition to stop wasting english scottish and irish tax payers money putting useless signs up in welsh.
